body:
Dear Mr. Roadrunner, 

as we talked about in our phone call yesterday, please meet me at the agreed upon location later today at 4pm at the bottom of the cliff. 
For your convenience there will be a large X marked on the road so you know where you need to be.

I'm looking forward to seeing you then to handle our past disagreements.

Kind regards,

Mr. Wile E. Coyote
